Articles.Content:
I have automatic updates enabled how do I check that they are installing?

will this be the same as downloading the latest version?

do I have to buy a new version to be up to date?

I am version 1.0.5

Did you purchase the game through Steam or via the KSP website?

On Steam updates should be automatic as far as I know. If you bought from the KSP website you'll need to re-download the latest version of the game in it's entirety.

The latest version is 1.1.3 by the way, so you are a few versions behind.
And no, you do not need to buy it again. Simply log in to wherever you bought it and download.
